code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

observation.value: shows nodular aggregates of basalioma cells are present in the dermis and exhibit peripheral palisading and retraction, melanin is also present within the tumor and in the surrounding stroma

td.content: s:patient says she is having symptoms of moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip 6 x week, in spite of treatment. she is a f aged 59 yrs. she is a heavy drinker she does not smoke o:Height 160 cm, Weight 91.9 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream, and ordered Shave biopsy.

td.content: s:pt complains of recurrent moderate ulcer on left elbow over the past month. The pt reports moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds, moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip. patient is a white female make-up artist aged 59 ys. o:Height 160 cm, Weight 93.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

content2.Unmatched: irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds ,

td.content: s:a 59 yr old female make-up artist presents w/ c/o 2 days h/o moderate ulcer with irregular borders that sometime crusts or bleeds, moderate ulcer on left elbow and moderate painful ulcer on the top of lower lip. o:Height 160 cm, Weight 91 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Skin Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 0.5 g topical cream.
